abstract: Hong Kong Securities and Futures Commission issues trading ban against American investor Andrew Left, who had publicly criticized accounts of Chinese property developer Evergrande Real Estate Group; Left is founder of California-based Citron Research.

headline.print_headline: Investor Who Questioned Chinese Firm  Is Suspended
headline.main: Hong Kong Tribunal Suspends Investor Who Criticized Chinese Firm

keywords.value: Hong Kong Securities and Futures Commission
keywords.name: organizations

snippet: The five-year trading ban against the American investor, who had criticized the accounts of a Chinese property developer, raised concern over free speech in Hong Kong’s financial markets....
lead_paragraph: The five-year trading ban against the American investor, who had criticized the accounts of a Chinese property developer, raised concern over free speech in Hong Kong’s financial markets.
